00050 /**********************************************
00051 *               Definitions
00052 **********************************************/
00053 /* Define the max number of PCI buses and slots */
00054 #define MAX_PCI_BUS                      32
00055 #define MAX_PCI_DEV                      32
00056 
00057 /* Define the valid vendor IDs */
00058 #define NO_VENDOR_ID                     0xFFFF
00059 #define PLX_VENDOR_ID                    0x10B5
00060 
00061 /* Define the valid device IDs */
00062 #define NO_DEVICE_ID                     0xFFFF
00063 #define PLX_9050_DEVICE_ID               0x9050
00064 #define PLX_9030_DEVICE_ID               0x9030
00065 #define PLX_9060_DEVICE_ID               0x9060
00066 #define PLX_9080_DEVICE_ID               0x9080
00067 #define PLX_9054_DEVICE_ID               0x9054
00068 #define PLX_480_DEVICE_ID                0x0480
00069 
00070 /* Define the evaluation board device IDs */
00071 #define PLX_9080RDK_960_DEVICE_ID        0x0960
00072 #define PLX_9080RDK_401B_DEVICE_ID       0x0401
00073 #define PLX_9080RDK_860_DEVICE_ID        0x0860
00074 #define PLX_9054RDK_860_DEVICE_ID        0x1860
00075 #define PLX_9054RDK_LITE_DEVICE_ID       0x5406
00076 #define PLX_CPCI9054RDK_860_DEVICE_ID    0xC860
00077 #define PLX_9656RDK_LITE_DEVICE_ID       0x5601
00078 #define PLX_9656RDK_860_DEVICE_ID        0x5602
00079 #define PLX_IOP480RDK_DEVICE_ID          0x0480
00080 #define PLX_9030RDK_LITE_DEVICE_ID       0x3001
00081 #define PLX_CPCI9030RDK_LITE_DEVICE_ID   0x30c1
00082 #define PLX_9050RDK_LITE_DEVICE_ID       0x9050
00083 
00084 // New Capabilities flags
00085 #define CAPABILITY_POWER_MANAGEMENT      (1 << 0)
00086 #define CAPABILITY_HOT_SWAP              (1 << 1)
00087 #define CAPABILITY_VPD                   (1 << 2)
00088 
00089 /* The local CPU will reset when this value is written to the doorbell */
00090 #define PLX_RESET_EMBED_INT              ((unsigned long)(1 << 31))
00091 
00092 /* Define a large value for a signal to the driver */
00093 #define FIND_AMOUNT_MATCHED              80001
00094 
00095 /* Define -1 values for the different types */
00096 #define MINUS_ONE_LONG                   0xFFFFFFFFL
00097 #define MINUS_ONE_SHORT                  0xFFFF
00098 #define MINUS_ONE_CHAR                   0xFF
00099 
00100 /*
00101  * The value for BLOCK_SIZE is standard for IBM image files and therfore 
00102  * should not be modified.
00103  */
00104 #define BLOCK_SIZE                       512
